list_upcoming_events.description: Lists upcoming calendar events for the next N days.

days.description: Number of days to look ahead (default: 7)

create_calendar_event.description: Creates a new event in Google Calendar.

list_incomplete_tasks.description: Lists all incomplete tasks from Google Tasks.

get_freebusy.description: Query free/busy information for a set of calendars.

calendars.description: List of calendar IDs to query.

max_results.description: Maximum number of emails to return (default: 30)

list_emails.description: Lists emails from Gmail inbox with details (JSON format).

max_results.description: Maximum number of emails to return (default: 30)

create_reply_draft.description: Creates a reply draft for a specific Gmail message, maintaining the thread.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to reply to.

signature.description: Optional signature to append to the reply.

add_task_from_email.description: Creates a Google Task from a Gmail message, including a link to the email.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to create a task from.

title.description: Optional custom title for the task. Defaults to email subject.

notes.description: Optional additional notes for the task.

ensure_phantom_labels.description: Ensures that required Phantom labels exist in Gmail.

modify_email_labels.description: Modifies labels on a Gmail message.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to modify.

add_labels.description: List of label IDs to add.

remove_labels.description: List of label IDs to remove.

archive_email.description: Archives a Gmail message by removing the 'INBOX' label.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to archive.

list_labels.description: Lists all available labels in Gmail.

mark_email_as_done.description: Marks an email as done (adds '4. 対応完了', removes '0. Phantom/To-Do' and 'INBOX').

message_id.description: The ID of the message to mark as done.
